ios.subtitle: Connect same balls with a line

editorialNotes.standard: Hamster wheels for exercise? Fishing ponds filled with capybaras? Theres so much cuteness packed into this idle resort gamewe may never leave!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Collect caterpillars, grab coins atop a giant kitty, and decorate houses to attract new residents to your cozy forest hamlet.

Ancient Egyptians loved cats, Metallica hasnt played the Super Bowl, and the Ganges is Indias largest riverall our useless knowledge is now coming in handy thanks to Trivia Crack. This bite-sized trivia game is totally irresistible, whether were dominating our Facebook friends in classic mode, trouncing strangers in the 12-question challenge mode, or just sneaking in a game on our Apple Watch. With its cute characters, heaps of unlockable achievements, and a massive variety of questions, we simply cant get enough.

editorialNotes.short: Can you guess the name of this mountain or metropolis?

name: Paint by Number Oil: Hey Color

editorialNotes.tagline: Do you want to buy a vowel?
editorialNotes.standard:
Whats so fun aboutspinning that wheel? Our three favorite things:
1. Lightning-fast rounds make forthe perfect quick-fix word game.
2. Playing friends head to head is irresistible. So isbuilding puzzles for them to solve.
3. We never get tiredof solvingpuzzles at the last second and winning bonus rounds.

ios.subtitle: Cool fun game for best friends

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The most ingenious thing about Blackbox's puzzles isnt that you solve them without tapping or swiping. Its that youll happily spend hoursfiguring outthe game'ssubtleclues. Do you need to tilt your iPhone, shout into the speaker, or something a lot trickier?Thinkingcreatively and finding the answer feels deeply rewarding, even profoundearning Blackbox an Apple Design Award.
